DOC.brief_summary: BioChaperone Combo liquid formulation contain Insulin Glargine Insulin Lispro . The aim trial ass efficacy safety BioChaperone® Combo subject type 1 diabetes dose 0.8 U/kg . This trial phase 1 single-center , randomize , double-blinded , two-treatment , two-period cross-over , 30-hour euglycaemic glucose clamp trial subject type 1 diabetes mellitus . Each subject randomly allocate one single dose 0.8 U/kg BioChaperone® Combo one single dose 0.8 U/kg Humalog® Mix 25 two separate dose visit .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Assess Efficacy Safety BioChaperone Combo Humalog Mix 25 Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
